vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ῥαββί,
O my Master, Hebrew word in [NT]; also ῥαββονί or ῥαββουνί, [NT]
vocabInfos.shortDef: Rabbi, a title of a teacher
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
§ Rabbi, a title of a teacher
also spelled ῥαββει, rabbi, my master, teacher, Mt. 23:7, 8; 26:25, 49
vocabInfos._es_Definition: rabino, instructor, maestro (título honorario para dirigirse a él)
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 師父, 先生
2) 拉比, 猶太人對老師的尊稱
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 师父, 先生
2) 拉比, 犹太人对老师的尊称
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: ra-bi ; thảy ; thầy tôi : chữ Ra-bi có nghĩa là giáo sư hoặc thầy. Xem H7227
